wikipedia_page.main: Edward William Abel,  (3 December 1931 – 19 April 2021) was a British chemist, editor of textbooks on organometallic chemistry and president of the Royal Society of Chemistry (1996-1998).He was appointed a Commander of the Order of the British Empire (CBE) in the 1997 Queen's Birthday Honours, for services to chemistry.

response: Edward Abel (born 30 January 1988) is an English first-class cricketer.  Abel is a left-handed batsman who bowls slow left-arm orthodox.  He was born at Salisbury, Wiltshire.
